skyrealm.general.tablist.footer.slogan: Construa o seu próprio reino no SkyRealm!

skyrealm.friend.requested: You received a friendrequest from <color:#FFD700>%player%</color>. <click:run_command='/friend accept %player%'><hover:show_text:'<aqua>Click to accept</aqua>'><color:#1fff39>[ACCEPT]</color></hover></click>
